1500155391489060867.text: No doubt after this call: Stronger sanctions are vital, including an embargo on Russian oil & gas. Boycott all Russian products & seize cronies’ assets. Isolate as a pariah.

1498882338553536512.text: Inspiring to hear the President powerfully push gun violence prevention—especially repeal of PLCAA’s sweetheart sweeping immunity for gun manufacturers & a ban on ghost guns. We need these laws, plus safe storage via Ethan’s Law.

1498882337412628480.text: So deeply human, the President’s caring & compassion shown movingly in his speech & in his warmth afterward as he lingered to say hello to me & so many others approaching him. Even at the end of a long night, his eyes & elan burned bright.

1498882336091512833.text: Sincerity, decency, honesty—basic down-to-earth American values were brought home by President Biden to every American home & filled the historic House chamber. His vigor & vision made the American dream real. #SOTU

The Women’s Health Protection Act would:
✔️Guarantee people’s right to abortion nationwide

✔️Ensure everyone is able to make their own health care decisions

Today I’m proud to vote YES on #WHPA & #ActForAbortionAccess.

1496970083737890823.text: 9/ America continues to stand for freedom & democracy. We cannot sit idly by while a democratic nation is trampled under the boot of an authoritarian dictator bent on remaking the international order in a way that threatens peace & prosperity for all.

1496970081515220992.text: 8/ We must continue to put economic pressure on Russia, Putin & his crony oligarchs. We must provide humanitarian assistance to Ukrainians fleeing his tyranny. We must continue to provide lethal assistance to the Ukrainian armed forces & resistance fighting this Russian invasion.

1496970079426261000.text: 7/ That is why we must inflict strict penalties against Russian aggressors who have manufactured this needless war & provide the strongest possible support to the people of Ukraine.

1496970077664538645.text: 6/ If he succeeds, we can expect the United States to face not only a pacing threat from China, but also an expansionist Russia that once again desires to dominate the former Soviet Republics along with wide swaths of Europe & the Middle East.

1496970075827580938.text: 5/ This attack on Ukraine, a western democracy, is a direct threat to the national & economic security of the United States. We have already seen a jump in gas prices & turmoil in the stock market due to Putin’s actions.

1496970074032324617.text: 4/ Vladimir Putin has violated core principles that uphold global peace & security, seeking to change the borders of a sovereign country by force & attacking the post-World War II global order.

1496970072312717323.text: 3/ Today, the people of Ukraine woke to an unprovoked & multi-pronged attack on their country: an attack on peaceful cities across Ukraine & an attack on the right of sovereign peoples everywhere to determine their own future.

1496970070597279745.text: 2/ We should aggressively push our allies to deny Russia access to the SWIFT world financial system & target Putin & his corrupt oligarchs with sanctions on their personal assets.

1496970068885917697.text: 1/ The courage of Ukrainians fighting for their homeland should be matched by even stronger, crippling sanctions by America & its allies.

1479207510489939973.text: Now, the Senate must act to fortify & reinforce our institutions from poisonous, toxic attempts to restrict access to the ballot box under the guise of “mass voter fraud” & “stolen elections.” We must protect voting rights & our democracy.

1479207506840858625.text: Today, my thoughts are with Capitol Police, Hill staffers, reporters, & all the essential custodial, food service, and other staff who serve our country & work in our temple of democracy in the name of public service.

1479207505704149000.text: There is a direct through line from the Big Lie and the January 6 assault incited by Donald Trump, to violent extremism & domestic terrorism, to voter suppression & the overturning of elections, eventually to the destruction of our democracy.

1479207504504672257.text: But January 6 was not a one-off. It was not an isolated or aberrant incident. It was a symptom & a symbol of a deeper destructive violence of radical extremism, a virus of domestic terrorism that continues to infect our nation.

1479207503212785664.text: On this solemn anniversary, I’m reminded of how fragile & endangered our democratic institutions are when our leaders fail to protect them, & how close we came to shattering the traditions & norms & losing our democracy.

1479207502059298823.text: Fueled by the Big Lie & baseless falsehoods of massive fraud, those domestic terrorists & violent extremists stormed the Capitol & hunted lawmakers & others while defacing & debasing not just the building, but the concept of democracy.

1479207500096360456.text: It’s been one year since we were all witnesses to an abhorrent attack on our democracy. Rioters armed with bats & pipes, a Confederate flag in the halls of Congress, ruthless attacks on police officers—not a week goes by where I don’t think about that dark, terrible day.

1436496006280060929.text:
"This policy needs to change. These at-risk Afghans need to be flown out of Afghanistan into safety & then vetted by Americans.

We are a proud nation that cares deeply about human rights, however, what we are doing is in inhumane."

1436496004421980188.text: "It’s devastating for me & for all of us veterans. If we go back on our word to our friends, we won’t have any friends left."

1436496002895253511.text: “I’m afraid the United States’ reputation has been irreparably damaged because they have so callously turned their backs on the people who sacrificed so much to help them."

1436496001418858521.text: "I haven’t slept or eaten for 4 weeks, wracked with fear that my family might die because of my service in the U.S. military.”

1436495999921491978.text: "All of the SIV applicants in my family have spouses, siblings &/or parents who are U.S. Citizens, yet they cannot get visas, & every time there was hope they could get out, it’s been dashed."

1436495998357020672.text: "They are being chased by the Taliban, hiding out in different places every night, to escape execution. One of them has an 88-year-old mother in a wheelchair who needs to move with him every couple of nights. Another is a man with an 8-month pregnant wife."

1436495996788346895.text: "So many of my brothers & sisters in & out of uniform are in disbelief that America could abandon Afghan allies who put their lives on the line for us & whom we promised to protect & bring to America when we left. Now we are leaving them to be slaughtered."

1436495995144179730.text:
"We in the military live by a strict code of honor. When we give our word, we make every sacrifice to uphold it.

Both my best friend & my favorite cousin were killed by the Taliban in that effort."

1436495993558732823.text: "My family & I in Afghanistan & in the U.S. made great sacrifices for America in hopes of ensuring that 9/11 doesn’t happen again & to give a better life to Afghans, especially women & children."

1436495991935537154.text:
"I’ve spent my entire adult life on active duty & as an intel officer in defense of this nation.

To say I’m heartbroken is an understatement."

1387602229658521601.text: Tonight’s speech was forceful, but clear-eyed, disciplined & determined. I was moved by the sense of history in the House chamber—reaffirming that democracy works after the abhorrent attack by rioters & the hardship & heartbreak of this past year.

1387600741544742913.text: Excited to be in the chamber tonight for President Biden’s first #JointAddress. Together we can #BuildBackBetter & deliver real relief to families, small businesses, & communities across our country. https://t.co/9k3KHmL13S

1387599201224253443.text: A clear-eyed, passionate call for commonsense measures against gun violence—straight from his heart. The President spoke emphatically, energetically from the podium. Moving beyond words.

1387590078571110401.text: A spine tingling sense of history at tonight’s #JointSession—feeling this exciting, energizing moment. America on the move again. But we can’t stop now. A big bold vision for action.

1387588918921633799.text: In this temple of democracy, stormed & captured by rioters only a few months ago, how inspiring to see it back at work again—I’m sitting in the House gallery, violently desecrated, now restored. We must unite & continue to move forward.

1387588043176128516.text: In this majestic chamber, even if only a fraction of the seats are filled, President Biden is creating exhilarating bonds of common purpose & pride in America. Rising from our seats for an America rising, with his leadership.

1387552782316675075.text: Congress must now build on these strong first steps with even bolder legislative action. I look forward to working with my colleagues & the Biden Administration to make sure we deliver for the American people.
